## includes variable

A more lenient typed version of `Array.prototype.includes` which allow less specific types to be checked.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
includes: <GType>(array: readonly GType[] | GType[], item: unknown, fromIndex?: number | undefined) => item is GType
```
